mapper.select: SELECT RN, SEQ, ID, TITLE, CONTENT, REGDATE, REFER, STEP, DEPTH,READCOUNT,DELFLAG FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY refer DESC, step) rn, SEQ, ID, TITLE, CONTENT, REGDATE, REFER, STEP, DEPTH,READCOUNT,DELFLAG FROM answerboard) a WHERE CEIL(rn/5) = #{pnum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ANSWERBOARD VALUES ( NULL,#{id},#{title},#{content},SYSDATE(), (SELECT NVL(MAX(REFER),0)+1 FROM ANSWERBOARD ALIAS_FOR_SUBQUERY), 0,0,0,'N')
